issue.title: [Java] JDBC-to-Arrow Conversion: Configuration Object
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3965](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3965). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are various methods for constructing Arrow vectors, alternating on two inputs:
 \* A calendar object
 \* A BaseAllocator

This creates a configuration class (JdbcToArrowConfig) to simplify configuring the adapter, and make it easier to add new functionality later.
